briefdescription.para: This is the KSP Steam App Id.
This is the KSP Making History DLC Steam App Id.
The Steam User Id that KSP is currently running under.
Will be true if Steam API is Initialized and ready.
The Steam App folder KSP is installed into.
The Steam Workshop folder for KSP.
This is the KSP Making History DLC Steam App Id.
This is the KSP Steam Cloud File Limit
This list contains all the active UGC Persona Updates
This list contains all the active UGC Queries
Will be true if KSP is running on a Valid Steam Platform.
Stores the current UGC Query total number of pages
Used to store app dependencies (DLCs) that need to be added to the current UGC update that may be executing. They will be added once the UGC update completes.
This is the link to the steam workshop legal agreement that users must accept before they can publish steam workshop items.
Get Steam friend name for the Steam Id that KSP is currently running under.

memberdef.argsstring: (Callback< AddAppDependencyResult_t, bool > onCompleted, PublishedFileId_t fileId, AppId_t appDependency)
memberdef.name: AddAppDependency

briefdescription.para: Adds an App Dependency to a workshop file. eg: Add a DLC required app.

parameterdescription.para: Callback that will be called when the update to the file is completed.
The steam fileId we are updating
The AppId_t to add. eg: Making History is- SteamManager.MakingHistoryAppID

memberdef.argsstring: (string folderPath, out ulong totalRequired, out ulong availAmount, out int totalFilesRequired, out int availFileCount)
memberdef.name: CheckCloudQuota

briefdescription.para: Will calculate the amount of space required for the passed in folderPath and whether the user has enough space available on their steam cloud storage or not.

parameterdescription.para: The full path of the data we want to check
Will contain the total required amount of space in bytes.
Will contain the total amount of steam cloud space available in bytes.
The total number of files in the passed in folder.
The total number of available file count in the users Steam Cloud.

simplesect.para: True if there is enough space, otherwise false.

briefdescription.para: Create a new Steam Item in workshop. You have to call UpdateItem to update the item once it is created. So after the KSPCreateItemCallback occurs.

parameterdescription.para: Callback that will occur once steam has created the item. You should then call UpdateItem from this callback
The workshop file type

briefdescription.para: Delete a Steam Item.

parameterdescription.para: The published steam fileId for the item to delete.
Optional callback when delete has completed.

briefdescription.para: Get App dependencies for a published Item.

parameterdescription.para: Callback that will be called when the query completes.
The steam fileId

memberdef.argsstring: (PublishedFileId_t fileID, out string stateText, out bool canBeUsed, out bool subscribed)
memberdef.name: GetItemState

briefdescription.para: Get the State of a published workshop Item. The return int representing a value in EItemState enum. Also returns a stateText string that can be used in the UI indicating the state of the item.

parameterdescription.para: The fileId to check

briefdescription.para: Get the Number of subscribed items for the current Steam user for KSP.
Returns all the Subscribed Items for the current Steam user for KSP.

Create a steam UGC query to get info about a particular workshop item by published fileId. You will have to iterate over the results calling QueryUGCItems to get details for each item. There will only be ONE result entry. When using this method. The onCompleted callback MUST: SteamUGC.ReleaseQueryUGCRequest(queryCallback.m_handle); when it is done with the response.

parameterdescription.para: Callback that will be called when the UGC Query callback occurs from Steam
The published steam fileId for the item

briefdescription.para: Get the details for a QueryUGCITems Item.

parameterdescription.para: The query handle (which is returned in SteamUGCQueryCompleted_t.m_handle)
the Index of the item in the UGC Query results

briefdescription.para: Get the Steam User Name for the passed in steam Id.

parameterdescription.para: Steam user Id
The TMPro UGUI text to update once the user name is available

memberdef.argsstring: (Callback< SteamUGCQueryCompleted_t, bool > onCompleted, EUGCQuery eugcQuery, EUGCMatchingUGCType matchingType, string[] tags, UInt32 page, bool returnMetadata, bool matchAllTags=true)
memberdef.name: QueryUGCItems

briefdescription.para: Create a Steam UGC query to get info about workshop items. You will usually have to iterate over the results calling QueryUGCItems to get details for each item. And make further calls to this method for following pages. The callback from Steam to this Class will calculate and store the CurrentQueryTotalPages for you. When using this method. The onCompleted callback MUST: SteamUGC.ReleaseQueryUGCRequest(queryCallback.m_handle); when it is done with the response.

parameterdescription.para: Callback that will be called when the UGC Query callback occurs from Steam
The Query sorting/filter option
The UGC types we are after
Any tags we want to match for in the query
The page of results we want. First call should pass 1.
Set to true UGC will return the items metadata with the query. You MUST still call SteamUGC.GetQueryUGCMetadata to retrieve the metadata for each item that is returned.
True by default. Will match ALL tags passed in. If set to false will match ANY tags passed in.

memberdef.argsstring: (Callback< SteamUGCQueryCompleted_t, bool > onCompleted, EUserUGCList listType, EUGCMatchingUGCType matchingType, EUserUGCListSortOrder sortOrder, string[] tags, UInt32 page)
memberdef.name: QueryUserUGCItems

briefdescription.para: Create a Steam UGC query to get info about the current users workshop items. You will usually have to iterate over the results calling QueryUGCItems to get details for each item. And make further calls to this method for following pages. The callback from Steam to this Class will calculate and store the CurrentQueryTotalPages for you. When using this method. The onCompleted callback MUST: SteamUGC.ReleaseQueryUGCRequest(queryCallback.m_handle); when it is done with the response.

parameterdescription.para: Callback that will be called when the UGC Query callback occurs from Steam
The Query sorting/filter option
The UGC types we are after
Any tags we want to match for in the query
The page of results we want. First call should pass 1.

memberdef.argsstring: (Callback< RemoteStoragePublishedFileSubscribed_t, bool > remoteFileSubscribedCallback, Callback< RemoteStoragePublishedFileUnsubscribed_t, bool > remoteFileUnsubscribedCallback)
memberdef.name: RegisterRemoteSubUnsubEvents

briefdescription.para: Will register the Remote Subscribe and Unsubscribe events from steam. (When a user subscribes or unsubscribes from an item outside of KSP). You MUST call RemoveRemoteSubUnsubEvents() when you no longer require this callback service.

parameterdescription.para: This callback will be called when a remote file is subscribed
This callback will be called when a remote file is unsubscribed

memberdef.argsstring: (Callback< RemoveAppDependencyResult_t, bool > onCompleted, PublishedFileId_t fileId, AppId_t appID)
memberdef.name: RemoveAppDependency

briefdescription.para: Remove an App dependency from a steam item.

parameterdescription.para: Callback that will be called when the Steam Update completes
The steam fileId
The App dependency to remove

briefdescription.para: Will remove registered Remote Subscribe and Unsubscribe events from steam. (When a user subscribes or unsubscribes from an item outside of KSP).
Subscribe the current Steam user to the passed in steam fileId.

parameterdescription.para: The published steam fileId for the item to subsribe to.
Optional callback when subscribe has completed.

briefdescription.para: Unsubscribe the current Steam user from the passed in steam fileId.

parameterdescription.para: The published steam fileId for the item to unsubscribe from.
Optional callback when unsubscribe has completed.

memberdef.argsstring: (Callback< SubmitItemUpdateResult_t, bool > onCompleted, PublishedFileId_t fileId, List< string > tags, string contentURL, string previewURL, string title, string description, string changeNote, ERemoteStoragePublishedFileVisibility visibility, string metaData, AppId_t[] appDependencies=null)
memberdef.name: UpdateItem

briefdescription.para: Calls steam to update an item in workshop.

parameterdescription.para: Callback that will be called when the update callback occurs from Steam
The steam fileId we are updating
Any tags to update on the item
The URL for the content to upload to the item
The URL for the preview picture
The title for the item
The description for the item
The change note that will be added for this update to the item
Visiblity value for the item
the Item's metadata
Array of Steam app dependencies to add to the item (DLCs)

briefdescription.para: Opens the Steam Overlay and opens a web browser to the workshop item matching the passed in steam published file Id
